name.zh-CN: Neon Noir 霓虹黑色电影

description.zh-CN: 霓虹黑色电影风格，融合赛博朋克美学和电影黑色谾。创造神秘氛围、紧张感和电影化视觉语言。霓虹黑色电影融合赛博朋克和电影黑色电影氛围。创造神秘心情和大气紧张。
description.en-US: Neon noir design combining cyberpunk aesthetics with film noir atmosphere creating moody mystery. Blends neon lighting with dark detective film style through contrasting colors, atmospheric depth, and dramatic lighting for moody, mysterious atmospheres Combines neon aesthetics with film noir atmosphere Ideal for mystery applications, noir-inspired content, and moody experiences This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. mysterious mood and atmospheric tension. Excellence in design.
